text: Charles Richard Gardner (22 December 1913 - 1997) was an English footballer. His regular position was as an inside right. Born in Birmingham, Gardner played for Evesham Town, Notts County, Stourbridge, Sheffield United, and Manchester United. ==References== ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1913 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Date of death missing Category:Footballers from Birmingham, West Midlands Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Stourbridge F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players
title: Dick Gardner
